Beachcomber looked up from the hole, his smile fading. "Why do you say
that?" He asked, curious of what Klant was refering to.

Firedrill kept studying the hole, it was so fascinating, and almost
equivelant to underground hidings of the Neutrals on his planet in the
past war.
